info.brief_description: One of the girls from "Assassination Classroom" fall in love with you.
info.description:
This is basically the same as my other stories. however lets go over the rules.

1:This is going to have a few details with anything supernatural, so listen up. One, I will allow comic book elements, but you MUST run it by me first!

2: the elements of the anime in terms of stuff that happened, DO have to happen, let's agree this was good and not cut stuff out, you can add things no issue, but don't cut any of the characters or the like.

3: try to explain WHY you're in E-Class. The tests in this try to play to yoru subjects, and show it off in some big arena like in the show, I find that fun

4: i will allow sex and foot fetish, but nothing gross, nothing extreme.

5: try building up the relationships nothing instant okay?

6. all characters are 18 or over, got that?

7. have fun
